com.b2international.snowowl.snomed.datastore.index

Class SnomedHierarchy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.b2international.snowowl.snomed.datastore.index.SnomedHierarchy

  • public class SnomedHierarchy
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds a snapshot of parent-child relationships within the SNOMED CT terminology.
